  • Constructor Details

    • PersonBuilder

      public PersonBuilder()
      Initializes the builder with the defaults set by ContactBuilder.

    • PersonBuilder

      public PersonBuilder(IType personSubtype)
      Initializes the builder with the defaults set by ContactBuilder, sets the type of the person to the given person subtype
      Parameters:
      personSubtype - type of person the builder will generate
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if given type is not Person or a subtype of Person

    • PersonBuilder

      public PersonBuilder(boolean withDefaultOfficialID)
      Initializes the builder with the defaults set by ContactBuilder.
      Parameters:
      withDefaultOfficialID - if true, sets up a default official id for the person

  • Method Details

    • uiReadyPerson

      public static PersonBuilder uiReadyPerson()
      Return a UI ready person builder with a UI ready primary address in the USA. Sets the following fields:
      • First name ("Fred")
      • Last name (unique name of the form JonesN where N is a unique number)
      • Primary address, generated by AddressBuilder.uiReadyUSA()
      • Work phone
      • Home phone
      • Cell phone
      • Fax
      • Primary phone set to work
      Returns:
      a new person builder

    • uiReadyPerson

      public static PersonBuilder uiReadyPerson(boolean withAddressBookUID)
      Return a UI ready person builder with a UI ready primary address in the USA. Sets the following fields:
      • First name ("Fred")
      • Last name (unique name of the form JonesN where N is a unique number)
      • Primary address, generated by AddressBuilder.uiReadyUSA()
      • Work phone
      • Home phone
      • Cell phone
      • Fax
      • Primary phone set to work
      Returns:
      a new person builder

    • uiReadyPersonOfType

      public static PersonBuilder uiReadyPersonOfType(IType personSubtype)
      Return a UI ready person builder for the given person subtype, with a UI ready primary address in the USA. Sets the following fields:
      • First name ("Fred")
      • Last name (unique name of the form JonesN where N is a unique number)
      • Primary address, generated by AddressBuilder.uiReadyUSA()
      • Work phone
      • Home phone
      • Cell phone
      • Fax
      • Primary phone set to work
      Parameters:
      personSubtype - subtype of person; the builder will construct an object of this type
      Returns:
      a new person builder
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if given type is not Person or a subtype of Person

    • uiReadyPersonOfType

      public static PersonBuilder uiReadyPersonOfType(IType personSubtype, boolean withAddressBookUID)
      Return a UI ready person builder for the given person subtype, with a UI ready primary address in the USA. Sets the following fields:
      • First name ("Fred")
      • Last name (unique name of the form JonesN where N is a unique number)
      • Primary address, generated by AddressBuilder.uiReadyUSA()
      • Work phone
      • Home phone
      • Cell phone
      • Fax
      • Primary phone set to work
      Parameters:
      personSubtype - subtype of person; the builder will construct an object of this type
      Returns:
      a new person builder
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if given type is not Person or a subtype of Person

    • getHansMolemanBuilder

      public static PersonBuilder getHansMolemanBuilder()
      Returns a builder that can be used to construct Hans Moleman. Whenever possible use uiReadyPerson instead.
      Returns:
      a new person builder

    • getKarenEgertsonBuilder

      public static PersonBuilder getKarenEgertsonBuilder()
      Returns a builder that can be used to construct Karen Egertson. Whenever possible use uiReadyPerson instead.
      Returns:
      a new person builder
